title: Nick Jonas:Nick Jonas Dances To Ayushmann’s 'Morni Banke', Proves He Has Desi Blood Running Through His Veins
text:
Nick Jonas Dances To Ayushmann’s 'Morni Banke', Proves He Has Desi Blood Running Through His Veins

Nick Jonas Dances To Ayushmann’s 'Morni Banke', Proves He Has Desi Blood Running Through His Veins

Nick Jonas was declared National Jiju when he married our Desi Girl Priyanka Chopra. Since then, he has been proving everyone how desi he is at his heart.

Twitter

He is a doting husband and he loves Bollywood movies. Just recently, Priyanka Chopra had revealed that he used to watch her movie Mary Kom when he would miss her. “He watched Mary Kom by himself one day. I was travelling and he called me and said, ‘Babe, I am missing you, so I am watching your movie’.” That’s indeed very sweet, isn’t it?

Twitter

Often Nick Jonas has showed us how much he loves Bollywood music. Videos of him grooving to peppy numbers have often made headlines. While Priyanka Chopra is in India currently for the promotions of her upcoming movie The Sky Is Pink, Nick Jonas, on the other hand is grooving to some desi music.

Don't Miss 420 SHARES 163 SHARES 145 SHARES 268 SHARES 211 SHARES

Right before his concert, Nick Jiju danced to Ayushmann Khurrana’s song Morni Banke from Badhaai Ho. You’ve got to check out his moves. Take a look!

Nick also promoted PC’s upcoming film. Sharing his own experience of watching the movie, he wrote in a post on Instagram, “This film touched my heart in so many ways. The story is bold and beautiful, and told perfectly by this incredible cast and by @shonalibose”

The Sky Is Pink, which stars Farhan Akhtar, Priyanka Chopra and Zaira Wasim in prominent roles, is set to release on Oct 11.
